versionFinder.comment: findMethod : method to find version from filename: [GETVERSION_FROM_FILENAME_SYNTAX, GETVERSION_FROM_FILENAME_CRC, GETVERSION_FROM_XML, GETVERSION_FROM_PROPERTIES, GETVERSION_FROM_RUN]#parameter : for findMethod GETVERSION_FROM_FILENAME_SYNTAX : regex with version in group 1#parameter : for findMethod GETVERSION_FROM_FILENAME_CRC : checksum value#parameter : for findMethod GETVERSION_FROM_XML : XPath to version value#parameter : for findMethod GETVERSION_FROM_PROPERTIES : marker to get version value#parameter : for findMethod GETVERSION_FROM_RUN : command to run to retrieve version
